title: 求可以避免mod物品id错乱的mod
author: 玖123

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
forge mod物品和数字ID的对应关系大概是储存在level.dat中
谨慎操作大概就能避免ID错乱

replies.author: zjxx
replies.txt_content:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/fo ... ll-anti-id-conflict


你可以看看这个避免冲突的mod

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
zjxx 发表于 2017-5-6 04:19
http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding/minecraft-mods/2387300-say-no-to-id-conflic ...
这个mod似乎是应对
生物群系，实体，附魔，药水的ID冲突的
